page.title: 07THE HERTFORD WAR MEMORIAL
page.content: The Hertford war memorial is situated in parliment square.It is widely known through Hertford and surrounding towns. It is made from Portland stone and the life sized Heart is made simply from bronze.The base and the memorial was designed the famous sir Aston Webb and made by Andrews and Son.the surmounting heart was designed by Mr.Maurice Webb, Mrs Webb and Mr Alfred Prury R.A.II was molded by Morris Art Foundry London.This great memorial states of the 352 who gave their lives for England in the First world war.This was also stated at the ceremony which took place at 3.00pm Sunday 6/11/21 with the unvailing from the Mayor.Thousands of people attended.
